entry.title: Steal My Phone, Steal My Heart (Daminette)
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,662Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: After 48 sleepless hours in Paris, a disheveled Marinette accidentally grabs the wrong phone—belonging to a rude American tourist. What follows is a chaotic chain of misadventures across the city. But as the day spirals out of control, could this unexpected mix-up be the start of something better?

entry.title: Time Files When I'm Writing To You
entry.summary:
Author: Jasmineose

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,179Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: One ended with:"You are chaos wrapped in kindness, Marinette Dupain-Cheng. And I, a boy raised in shadows, have only ever wanted to bask in your light."Another replied:"You are a gremlin with a superiority complex. But you are mine. And I think... I love you for that."The story never ended.Because love, like pigeons and crime-fighting teenagers, always finds a way.A way back to each other.A way back with you.

entry.title: Wedded in Shadows: The Ties that Bind
entry.summary:
Author: ToastyRoastyBa

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,222Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 494

Summary: My take on a Soulmate/Arranged Marriage AUMarinette Dupain-Cheng and Damian Wayne are bound together by an arranged marriage set in motion when they are just seven years old. This alliance is part of a truce between the Guardians of the Miraculous and the League of Assassins. Though their initial meeting is awkward, they quickly form a close friendship filled with playful banter and innocent dates, gradually falling in love.They suddenly get separated due to an attack from Slade, Only a Ribbon that Damian Keeps tied to his neck, Grounding himself to this Earth, With the hope that Marinette is alive.(They meet each other 2-3 years later dw)

entry.title: Love Letters to a Ghost
entry.summary:
Author: Sunkissedtherain

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,824Chapters: 22/22Kudos: 134

Summary: When Marinette Dupain-Cheng writes fake love letters to get out of a well-meaning matchmaking scheme, she never expects her imaginary boyfriend to show up—especially not as an international heir with secrets of his own. What begins as a PR mess spirals into late-night strategy sessions, Paris tabloids, and a complicated entanglement neither of them saw coming. She wanted distance. He wanted discretion. Now the world is watching.

entry.title: Defenders of the Universe
entry.summary:
Author: aldanavroon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,567Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 91

Summary: In a universe where divine forces walk reborn among mortals, balance is everything—and it’s breaking. The ancient Order of Guardians has fallen. Chaos stirs. And four Souls, once meant to appear one at a time, have returned all at once.Creation. Destruction. Lie. Intuition.They’re not ready. They’re not trusted. And one of them looks a little too much like someone Batman once called his son.As legends rise and secrets unravel, the fate of the multiverse may rest on the shoulders of children—ones who carry the weight of gods.

entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 93,427Chapters: 38/?Kudos: 479

Summary: In her final year of lycée, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itself—one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before it’s too late.

entry.title: The Love I Need
entry.summary:
Author: reagan_29

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,308Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Hey so i hope you enjoy this spinoff from the story “Shes sunshine, she’s grace, she’ll punch you in the face” by Brinxiethebear! this is just my spinoff of what happens after marinette comes back to paris and if this takes place in 2024/2025 and marinette is a competitive dancer! there will be angst when mentioning some akuma attacks (which some i made up) and there will be no smut as i don’t want to write that!please leave comments with tips on how to improve! Marinette is back in Paris but misses Gotham so much, But the part of Gotham she misses is The Wayne’s as they had become such a big part of her life in the past few weeks and she has grown to love them very quickly, While Marinette is back in Paris missing the Wayne’s, The Wayne’s (especially Damian) are also missing Marinette and are starting to plan a surprise visit for over Christmas break. Marinette has suppressed her feelings over her friends leaving her for Lila for a while now but now that they are all friends again she finds herself starting to break. Will she find herself spiraling or will a certain someone be able to help. *Re-named used to be “the aftermath of something new”*

Summary: October 27th, 2077, was the day the world ended when nuclear bombs dropped, turning through the world into a wasteland, but for Marinette and Damian, their world changed when they entered Vault 111 after they saw a Nuclear cloud in the distance. So, after 200 years, they emerged from the vault where they rebuilt or tried to rebuild civilization, but with factions fighting with each other. Marinette and Damian have a hard time on their hands, but at least they have each other with them.It will contain Daminette smut in every chapter
